title: Amélie: Le Fabuleux destin d'Amélie Poulain
description: Le Fabuleux destin d'Amélie Poulain (known in the United States as Amélie ) is the story of a lonely young waitress in the Montmartre district who decides to devote herself to improving the lives of people around her. Isabelle Vanderschelden provides analysis and social context for the film and the reasons behind its success.
author: Isabelle Vanderschelden
